## IObject3dAccessor interface

Accessor for unspecified 3D objects, like landmarks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IObject3dAccessor 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-mapview.iobject3daccessor.color.md) | THREE.Color \| undefined \| Array&lt;THREE.Color \| undefined&gt; | Get the color from materials. |
|  [geometryType](./harp-mapview.iobject3daccessor.geometrytype.md) | [GeometryType](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrytype.md) | Hint for the original type of geometry. |
|  [renderOrder](./harp-mapview.iobject3daccessor.renderorder.md) | number | Render order. |
